phrase.item: When each flower blooms in this grassland, they get colorful. The partridge in this garden has thousands of tones.
I say unfortunately in the garden of ephemeral life, by the weary wind in the end it holds [becomes] dust.
Do not be sorrowful and don't wail, sorrow and wailing are useless.
The world is not going to stay like this, don't become a pilgrim.
When hardship comes, don't be sorrowful, for the work [rules] of lives are not in a rush.
Everything passes from people's minds, and never see yourself as less than others.
